summary:
This project is an attempt to convert All Brokefoots UNP Mashup 
outfits to CHSBHC.(complete)
descriptionHtml:
=======Description============================

This project is an attempt to convert All Brokefoots UNP Mashup 
outfits to CHSBHC. (complete)
1.Dandelion
2.Khantu
3.Leah
4.ScampsIron
5.Temptress
6.VickyA

==============================================
INSTALLATION:
Download the files in the Required section below or else... 
After installing the skeletons and running the FNISGenerator, Either install with NMM or manually extract to your Skyrim/Data folder and enjoy.

Skyrim Patch 1.8 Content (which is optional)
CHSBHC body mod and BBP -Breast and Butt Physics 
FNIS Behavior Files and Generator 4.0.2

Recommended:
CBBE-CHSBHC-UNP-ADEC-Human Argonian Khajiit Texture-4096
NoMaaM Breathing Idles BBB 
NoMaaM Walk BBB - inverse orientation

Original Author\\\'s Work:
Brokefoots UNP Mashup Compilation

Usage:
_Craft. Color. Temper. Repeat.

Known Bugs/Issues/Oddities:
_Nothing game breaking... mostly random clipping.
_Some have reported the Scamp\'s Bra causing their player\'s skin to appear burnt. When this happens, it means your game is being stubborn and not loading the race-specific skin texture (read Texture Swap for Creation Kit). Simply un-equip and re-equip the item to make the game do what it is supposed to.
_Certain items like Khantu\'s Iron Hands, Dandelion\'s Limb and Vicky\'s Reinforcement will not show in first person. This is a limitation of the game, not this mod\'s problem. Only items slotted to \'hands, forearms or body\' will show in first person.
_Oh, and the stats are seriously overpowered. Fix it yourself if you\'re that damn upset.

my other work
CHSBHC Northgirl Armor= http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/44134//? 
CHSBHC DLC Dragonborn=  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/43785//?
author: golgappa
